snippet: Brooklyn Bridge Park started a contest to name one of its lawns, but when a campaign arose to name it after Chris Hondros, a war photographer from Brooklyn who died in 2011, the park declined.
abstract: Brooklyn Bridge Park Conservancy cancels contest to name one of its lawns after campaign arises to name it after Chris Hondros, war photographer from Brooklyn who died in 2011; group says naming lawn for one person is not fully representative of the many deserving Brooklyn residents to memorialize.
lead_paragraph: Brooklyn Bridge Park started a contest to name one of its lawns, but when a campaign arose to name it after Chris Hondros, a war photographer from Brooklyn who died in 2011, the park declined.

headline.seo: Contest to Name Brooklyn Park Lawn Is Halted as It Gets Personal
headline.main: Contest to Name a Lawn Ends as It Gets Personal
headline.print_headline: Contest to Name a Lawn Ends as It Gets Personal
